item.title: Pythonでjpgからpngへ一括変換
item.description: jpg から png への一括変換 (マルチプロセス) from concurrent.futures import ProcessPoolExecutor, ThreadPoolExecutor from functools import partial from pathlib import Path from typing import List from PIL import Image, ImageFile ImageFile.LOAD_TRUNCATED_IMAGES = True def list_file_paths(dir_path: str) -> List[str]: """ List file paths in a directory. Parameters ---------- dir_path : str Path of the directory Returns ------- List[str] List of the file paths in the directory """ return sorted([str(path) for path in Path(dir_path).rglob("*") if path.
